title: DeepWork Policy Definition
description: Schema for .deepwork.policy.yml files that define policies triggering based on file changes

globPattern.description: A glob pattern for matching file paths (supports * and ** wildcards)

globPatternOrArray.description: One or more glob patterns for matching file paths

policy.description: A policy that triggers based on file changes

trigger.description: Glob pattern(s) for files that, if changed, should trigger this policy

safety.description: Glob pattern(s) for files that, if also changed, mean the policy doesn't need to trigger

instructions.description: Instructions to give the agent when this policy triggers

instructions_file.description: Path to a file containing instructions (alternative to inline instructions)

compare_to.description: What to compare against when detecting changed files. 'base' (default) compares to the base of the current branch. 'default_tip' compares to the tip of the default branch. 'prompt' compares to the state at the start of the prompt.
